Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Stay at Le Grand”
Reviews.Author: smaactraveler
Reviews.Content: time le grand visited paris times stayed 45 star hotels decided le grand staying ago intercontinental bora spa time joined ambassador club gold traveled paris time 17 daughter visit daughter study abroad term time stay touristy stops walk neighborhoods paris shopping time le grand lovely hotel ambassador found upgraded junior suite wonderful true junior suite european junior suite sitting bed desk bathroom walk closet closet ton lighting immaculate comfortable bathroom walls tiny bit fixing tiny bit peeling paint obviously due humidity gathers tv english speaking channels understand availability services hotels europe provide english speaking options tv opted breakfast hotel morning nice change pretty extensive items offered hot cold love breakfast price isnt bad am huge breakfast person am ate 50 worth breakfast arranged car service airport impeccable highly recommend le grand
